com.vub.service

Class RoomService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vub.service.RoomService

  • public class RoomService
extends java.lang.Object

    Service class for the Room object. This object provides all of the business logic, which includes:

    • Standard CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update and Delete)
    • Listing all the rooms in the database

    • Method Detail

      • createRoom

        public Room createRoom(Room room)
        Create a new room in the database. Use the returned Room for further computation, as it might've changed.
        Parameters:
        room - The Room object to store in the database
        Returns:
        Room object which is the result from saving the room to the database.

      • updateRoom

        public Room updateRoom(Room room)
        Update the given room object in the database. Use the returned value for further computation.
        Parameters:
        room - Room object to update in the database
        Returns:
        Room object which is the result of the update in the database

      • findRoomById

        public Room findRoomById(int id)
                  throws RoomNotFoundException
        Find a room object in the database.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the room which needs to be fetched
        Returns:
        A Room object fetched from the database
        Throws:
        RoomNotFoundException - When no room could be found with the given ID

      • deleteRoom

        public void deleteRoom(Room room)
        Delete a Room object from the database
        Parameters:
        room - The room object one wishes to delete

      • getRooms

        public java.util.Set<Room> getRooms()
        List all of the rooms currently present in the database
        Returns:
        List of Room objects in the database

      • getBuildingName

        public java.lang.String getBuildingName(Room room)
        Parameters:
        room - The room object of which you want to know the building
        Returns:
        The name of the building a room belongs to

      • getRoomVUBNotation

        public java.lang.String getRoomVUBNotation(Room room)
        The VUB notation is a concatenation of building name, floor name and room name, separated by a dot.
        Parameters:
        room - The room of which you want the name in VUB notation
        Returns:
        Gets the name of the room in VUB notation, or returns the rooms' display name if defined
